channel.title: Errors Please help me
channel.description:
Unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine Error: A fatal exeption has occurred. Program will exit.
Wtf does it means? When i delete the "-d" in the compiler, I get this error:
Error: Could not find or load main class bin
So I don't know wtf i should do. Please help me.

item.title: Errors Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Gaius-Julius_Caesar Gaius-Julius Caesar
item.description:
@Gaius-Julius_Caesar wrote:

If you seriously don’t know how to fix this, I recommend using Docs.Oracle or Java Tutorials, before even starting RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Errors Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe" -xmx1024 -classpath data/deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;data/deps/jython.jar;data/deps/xstream.jar;data/deps/mina.jar;data/deps/mysql.jar;data/deps/poi.jar;data/deps/slf4j.jar;data/deps/slf4j-nop.jardata/deps/xstream.jar java src\server\*.java src\server\core\*.java src\server\core\config\*.java src\server\core\event\*.java src\server\core\event\impl\*.java src\server\core\task\*.java src\server\core\task\impl\*.java src\server\core\tick\*.java src\server\model\content\*.java src\server\model\content\minigames\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\pathfinder\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\magic\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\melee\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\range\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\players\randomevents\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\region\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java pause

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe” -classpath data/deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;data/deps/jython.jar;data/deps/xstream.jar;data/deps/mina.jar;data/deps/mysql.jar;data/deps/poi.jar;data/deps/slf4j.jar;data/deps/slf4j-nop.jardata/deps/xstream.jar java src\server*.java src\server\core*.java src\server\core\config*.java src\server\core\event*.java src\server\core\event\impl*.java src\server\core\task*.java src\server\core\task\impl*.java src\server\core\tick*.java src\server\model\content*.java src\server\model\content\minigames*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\pathfinder*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\combat*.java src\server\model\players\combat\magic*.java src\server\model\players\combat\melee*.java src\server\model\players\combat\range*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\players\randomevents*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\region*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java

item.title: Errors Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Add in -xmx1024. This increases the maximum amount of memory that your system will allot to the JVM.

Read full topic
